roles.info: Responsible for the current recording: customer ledger, supplier ledger, expense management, involved in the closing work. Administered the projects for the commercial film department.

As Treasury Officer in Group Treasury I worked with payments, bank reconciliations and financial statements. I was responsible for the parent company guarantees and involved in the work with the company's insurances.
Responsible for housing associations' accounting with a focus on financial statements and budgets.
On behalf of customers, I have been responsible for their customer ledger and taken care of payments, refunds, reminders and debt collection processes.

education.education: Degree of Bachelor of Science in Business Administration and Economics
